Name: Valkyrie Champions
About the game: Valkyrie Champions is a mission-based Hero Shooter with an emphasis on upgrades and progression. Choose your champion and fight solo or with up to 4 online friends against huge amounts of enemies and ultimately save the lands against evil! Features - Single player or play online with 4 Steam Friends. - 4 selectable Valkyrie Champions to choose from, each with their own weapon/spell set and unique stats. - Multiple missions with varying difficulty modes to master. - Unlockable weapons and equipment to develop your combat skills. - Challenge a large variety of Monsters and Bosses! - Skill tree to strengthen your characters!
